item.title: Useful Properties of Cross Product
item.description: This note is going to go important properties of what you might call the cross product matrix. For a vector $u \in \mathbb{R}^3$ we’ll write $$[u]_\times = \begin{bmatrix} 0 & -u_z & u_y \\ u_z & 0 & -u_x \\ -u_y & u_x & 0\end{bmatrix}$$ to mean the $3\times 3$ matrix such that $[u]_\times v = u \times v$ for a all $v \in \mathbb{R}^3$. These matrices are closely related to rotations due through the Rodrigues formula.
